path.description: The path to the visualizer root module. The path is relative to the `baseDir`.

includeStyles.description: Set this flag, if the visualizer module imports any style files. Styles will be bundled to a single CSS file.

modules.description: List of visualizer root modules that will be included in the page.

projectName.description: The project name is displayed everywhere where a title is needed; in the navigation bar, in the page title (browser tab), and so on.

repository.description: The repository field contains the URL of the git repo that hosts the project sources.

download.description: The download field contains the URL of the download site, typically NPM home page.

license.description: The URL of the license info page.

logo.description: Link to the logo image used in the navigation bar. This should be an icon, a small bitmap, or a SVG file.

syntaxHighlight.description: There are multiple syntax highlight schemes to choose from. These should be familiar from popular text editors.

useMath.description: LiTScript uses KaTeX to layout mathematical formulas. By turning the `useMath` field on, KaTeX is loaded from an external CDN.

tocMenuHeader.description: The text appearing in the header of the TOC menu.

pageMenuHeader.description: The text appearing in the header of the page menu.

footer.description: The best place for copyright and other general information is the footer.

footerLocation.description: You can show footer in page menu, content area, or TOC menu.

userTheme.description: The path to a file that overrides theme settings. The path is relative to `baseDir`.

pageTemplate.description: Template used for generating web page.
